description:
Large renovated 1br in a great location! Up and coming neighborhood with a plethora of dining options and supermarkets. Located right between the 1 and the ABCD. Only 20 minutes to midtown,10 minutes to Columbia and a five minute walk to city college

3 week minimum
name: Beautiful 1br in Hamilton heights!
review: Great communication throughout process.  The space was very comfortable and clean.  Very central and easy to get around NYC from here...This place was perfect!!  For the price I don't think you can find anything better.  Excellent spot
